Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.8306981]Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=6.4 µM);Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=3.2 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref:8306981]Non-hemolytic activity against rabbit red blood cells.
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria. Also has antiprotozoal activity against L. amazonensis. No hemolytic activity.
